title: Pink Floyd Rehearsal  1969 RFH69 HRV XVID
description:
This is about 20 mins of b/w footage shot at the Royal Festival Hall
by Anthony Stern (it sez so right there on the opening slate). It seems
that Stern was called earlier that day by the band to shoot this amazing
and unique performance. Unfortunately, he didn&#039;t go through all the
proper channels, and only got permission from the RFH to shoot the
rehearsals and only in certain areas of the venue. This becomes apparent
when the venue&#039;s security "busts" him and orders him to turn over all
of his equipment. This all takes place while the camera is still rolling,
but with audio only! You can hear the escalating dialogue between
Anthony and security/management as he pleads his case. Too bad he
didn&#039;t go through the proper channels and pay for the rights to film
the actual show, as he was evidently prepared to do, but at least we
have this incredible rehearsal footage to marvel at. That&#039;s the story I
heard and this is how I pieced this thing together. Maybe a phone call
to Mr. Stern would clear things up. I&#039;ll get back with an update if he
does. There is also current speculation that the actual performance
was filmed as well (quoted recently by Roger Waters).

Again dvd converted and seeded for those with limited bandwidth and or divx compatable dvd players.....

All props go to rontoon and harvested records :)
